title: Charmed sisters reunion in Grey's Anatomy is everything
text:
I’m not crying, you’re crying (Picture: Getty)

Holly Marie Combs and Alyssa Milano have once again shared a heartfelt hug on our screens as sisters, but with the backdrop of a hospital in Grey’s Anatomy rather than at the Halliwell manor of Charmed.

Holly and Alyssa guest star in an upcoming episode of the medical drama as sisters who arrived at Pac North to check on their other sibling, who is apparently not played by Shannen Doherty nor Rose McGowan – rude.

‘We’re sisters’, the pair say to each other in a sneak peek of the episode released by ABC in which they attempt to figure out the circumstances that led to their sister Heather Peterson’s injury at a construction site.

Holly who played Piper and Alyssa who played Phoebe in the hit nineties supernatural series are reuniting as part of ABC’s Cast From the Past, a special week of episodes that reunites the casts of beloved TV shows.

Sisters forever (Picture: ABC)

The episode, which airs on Thursday, also sees the two sisters reunited with former Charmed executive producers Krista Vernoff and Andy Reaser.
